trans-unit.source: Copies the entire collection to a compatible one-dimensional <xref:System.Array>, starting at the specified index of the target array.
trans-unit.target: 將整個集合複製到相容的一維<xref:System.Array>，從目標陣列的指定索引處開始。</xref:System.Array>

trans-unit.source: The one-dimensional <xref:System.Array> that is the destination of the elements copied from <xref href="Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildPropertyGroupCollection"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 一維<xref:System.Array>也就是從複製之元素的目的地<xref href="Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildPropertyGroupCollection"> </xref>。</xref:System.Array>

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index in `array` at which copying begins.
trans-unit.target: 中以零為起始的索引`array`由此開始複製。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating the number of <xref href="Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildPropertyGroup"></xref> objects in the collection.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，指出數目<xref href="Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildPropertyGroup"></xref>集合中的物件。

trans-unit.source: Each <xref:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildPropertyGroup> object in the collection represents a element in the project.
trans-unit.target: 每個<xref:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildPropertyGroup>集合中的物件，表示專案中的項目。</xref:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildPropertyGroup>

trans-unit.source: An integer value representing the number of <xref href="Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildPropertyGroup"></xref> objects in the collection.
trans-unit.target: 整數值，代表數<xref href="Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildPropertyGroup"></xref>集合中的物件。

trans-unit.source: Gets an enumerator that iterates through the <xref href="Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildPropertyGroupCollection"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 取得可逐一查看的列舉值<xref href="Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildPropertyGroupCollection"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: This method allows the caller to use the `foreach` statement of the C# language (`for each` in [!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/add/includes/vbprvb-md.md)]) to iterate through the individual <xref:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildPropertyGroup> objects in the <xref:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildPropertyGroupCollection>.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法可讓呼叫端使用`foreach`C# 語言的陳述式 (`for each`中[!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/add/includes/vbprvb-md.md)]) 來逐一查看個別<xref:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildPropertyGroup><xref:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildPropertyGroupCollection>.</xref:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildPropertyGroupCollection>中的物件</xref:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildPropertyGroup>

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether access to the <xref href="Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildPropertyGroupCollection"></xref> is synchronized (thread safe).
trans-unit.target: 取得值，指出是否存取<xref href="Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildPropertyGroupCollection"></xref>是同步 （安全執行緒）。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if access to the <xref href="Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildPropertyGroupCollection"></xref> is synchronized (thread safe); otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果存取<xref href="Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildPropertyGroupCollection"></xref>是同步 （安全執行緒），否則<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets an object that can be used to synchronize access to the <xref href="Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildPropertyGroupCollection"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 取得物件，可用來同步處理存取具備<xref href="Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildPropertyGroupCollection"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: An object that can be used to synchronize access to the <xref href="Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildPropertyGroupCollection"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 物件，可用來同步處理存取具備<xref href="Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildPropertyGroupCollection"> </xref>。
